content: do you have some caron swirl cakes stashed away this pattern uses 34 g 1 19 oz and 38 yds 34 m for the adult size headband this pattern works up very quickly less than an hour and is available in sizes 5 sizes rectangle measurements before assembly and without stretching this headband is stretchy small child ear-warmer age 3-5 years 3 inches x 15 width child ear-warmer age 6-10 years height 3 inches x 16 width teen ear-warmer adult small height 4 inches x 17 width adult medium ear-warmer height 4 inches x 18 width adult large ear-warmer height 4 inches x 19 width the other 2 earwarmer patterns using this stashed yarn are reversible bulky ear warmer 1 bulky ribbed ear-warmer 2 i have included instructions and linked my tutorial 3 if you prefer seaming this as a twisted ear warmer have fun ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesign/ youtube https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confi… facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesign/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter @oombawkadesigncrochet © 2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2022/01/reversible-bulky-ear-warmer html 2 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2022/01/bulky-ribbed-ear-warmer-pattern html 3 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2022/01/how-to-make-a-twisted-ear-warmer html
